ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Vortex 2.0
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Barringer Habitat is lost with almost all hands, but the survivors still have much to fear from the dead. A final reckoning is coming for Dixon and the monstrous creature found in the depths of that ancient asteroid. But will his team be able to save anyone - or even themselves - before the Vortex closes forever?
